attributes.action: ensure that all MPs found guilty of misappropriate expenses claims will not receive the normal allowances/pensions if they do not resign until the next election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reason so many MPs are not resigning with immediate effect is that in so doing they would lose all financial benefits/allowances.  Other people found guilty of misappropriation let alone criminal fraud would have contracts terminated immediately without any benefits.  This should also apply to MPs!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
